name: Ashes
description: Ashes is a first person narrative with melee combat, puzzles and light platforming. It is a mix between games like skyrim and a walking simulator, a short experience to be enjoyed in one sitting where you can explore a dungeon and be immersed in the character's story and the adventure.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i3-4158U @ 2.00GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 700 Series DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 9 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-6260U @ 1.80GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 1000 Series DirectX: Version 12 Storage: 20 GB available space
